original_title: 2024 Scholarship Exam paper marking to resume from Jan 8
original_body_lines: The Department of Examinations has announced that the paper marking process for the 2024 Grade 05 Scholarship Examination, which was the subject of recent controversy, will resume next week.
Accordingly, the Commissioner General of Examinations, Amith Jayasundara, stated that the paper marking process will take place from January 08 to January 12.
